item.title: The Interactive Report, Interactive Grid, and Classic Report -Oracle APEX
item.description: Oracle APEX offers various report types to display data effectively, catering to different user needs and preferences. Here’s an overview of the three main report types:- Interactive Report, Interactive Grid, and Classic Report: Interactive Report Interactive Reports are highly customisable and user-friendly. They offer features such as sorting, filtering, highlighting, and aggregation directly within the report itself, providing users with a dynamic and interactive experience. Key Features: Interactive Features: Users can sort, filter, and customise the display of data interactively without needing to reload the page.
